price: យើងបានកំណត់សេចកី្ដស្លាប់រវាងពួកអ្នក ហើយយើងមិន មែនជាអ្នកដែលគ្មានសមត្ថភាពនោះឡើយ។
arabic: نَحۡنُ قَدَّرۡنَا بَيۡنَكُمُ ٱلۡمَوۡتَ وَمَا نَحۡنُ بِمَسۡبُوقِينَ

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: naḥnu qaddarnā baynakumu al-mawta wamā naḥnu bimasbūqīna
